validators.js - Fis3 Code

Source code

  1. 'use strict';

  3. ‌var index = require('./index');
  4. ‌var parse = require('./parse');
  5. ‌var association = require('./association');

  7. ‌function compareBuilder (compare) {
  8.   return function factory (value) {
  9.     var fixed = parse(value);

  11.     return function validate (date) {
  12.       var cal = index.find(value);
  13.       var left = parse(date);
  14.       var right = fixed || cal && cal.getMoment();
  15.       if (!right) {
  16.         return true;
  17.       }
  18.       if (cal) {
  19.         association.add(this, cal);
  20.       }
  21.       return compare(left, right);
  22.     };
  23.   };
  24. }

  26. ‌function rangeBuilder (how, compare) {
  27.   return function factory (start, end) {
  28.     var dates;
  29.     var len = arguments.length;

  31.     if (Array.isArray(start)) {
  32.       dates = start;
  33.     } else {
  34.       if (len === 1) {
  35.         dates = [start];
  36.       } else if (len === 2) {
  37.         dates = [[start, end]];
  38.       }
  39.     }

  41.     return function validate (date) {
  42.       return dates.map(expand.bind(this))[how](compare.bind(this, date));
  43.     };

  45. ‌    function expand (value) {
  46.       var start, end;
  47.       var cal = index.find(value);
  48.       if (cal) {
  49.         start = end = cal.getMoment();
  50.       } else if (Array.isArray(value)) {
  51.         start = value[0]; end = value[1];
  52.       } else {
  53.         start = end = value;
  54.       }
  55.       if (cal) {
  56.         association.add(cal, this);
  57.       }
  58.       return {
  59.         start: parse(start).startOf('day').toDate(),
  60.         end: parse(end).endOf('day').toDate()
  61.       };
  62.     }
  63.   };
  64. }

  66. var afterEq  = compareBuilder(function (left, right) { return left >= right; });
  67. var after    = compareBuilder(function (left, right) { return left  > right; });
  68. var beforeEq = compareBuilder(function (left, right) { return left <= right; });
  69. var before   = compareBuilder(function (left, right) { return left  < right; });

  71. var except   = rangeBuilder('every', function (left, right) { return right.start  > left || right.end  < left; });
  72. var only     = rangeBuilder('some',  function (left, right) { return right.start <= left && right.end >= left; });

  74. module.exports = {
  75.   afterEq: afterEq,
  76.   after: after,
  77.   beforeEq: beforeEq,
  78.   before: before,
  79.   except: except,
  80.   only: only
  81. };
